ctx-deleteditemaccess.description: Lists applications with permissions for deleted objects
ctx-deleteditemaccess.query: MATCH p=(d:AD_Deleted)-[]->(a:CTX_Application) WITH nodes(p) AS items UNWIND items as item RETURN DISTINCT item

ctx-orphanedaccess.description: Lists applications with permissions for orphaned objects
ctx-orphanedaccess.query: MATCH p=(d:Orphaned)-[]->(a:CTX_Application) WITH nodes(p) AS items UNWIND items as item RETURN DISTINCT item

GIVES_ACCESS_TO_CTX.description: Item (e.g. AD group) gives access to/enables Citrix item
